name: Farsighted Oracle
text: False Faith - When Farsighted Oracle enters the battlefield, if you control a white enchantment, put a mist counter on Farsighted Oracle. Gain 4 life. {1}{g}{w}, {t}: put a mist counter on Farsighted Oracle. {t}, Remove a mist counter from Farsighted Oracle: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
